Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30192544]MERS-CoV:inhibition of cell-cell fusion between 293T / MERS / EGPF cells and Huh-7 cells(EC50=1.68±0.47 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide can interact with both MERS-CoV and IAV NHR trimeric coiled coils to prevent virus–cell membrane fusion.

Literature.Title: De Novo Design of α-Helical Lipopeptides Targeting Viral Fusion Proteins A Promising Strategy for Relatively Broad-Spectrum Antiviral Drug Discovery.
Literature.Author: Wang C, Zhao L, Xia S, Zhang T, Cao R, Liang G, Li Y, Meng G, Wang W, Shi W, Zhong W, Jiang S, Liu K.
